name: Purgatory, Please
description:
Create Jam Fall 2021 Community Award Winner!

Thousands of people are waiting in line at Purgatory, and it's your job to assign them their fate!

By looking at the recently-deceased mortal's documents, find out whether they live up to the ever-increasing requirements for making it to Heaven! Or, if they've committed a grave sin, you might have to send them to eternal damnation... IN HELL!!! You're on a time limit, so get as many people through as you can!

Try to beat the developer High-Score of 26!

Made for Create Jam Fall 2021 under the theme "Mythology" and the challenge "Underworld and Overworld".

Made by 3. Klasses Sodavandsfest:

  • Rebecca - Head Artist, Programmer
  • Tonko - Head Programmer
  • Tobi - Head Sound, Art, Programming,
